summary: REQ-15 appears implemented via updated favicon link markup in frontend/index.html. REQ-14 (adding the actual PNG file at the required path) does not appear implemented because no new asset file was added in the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the favicon file exists at frontend/public/assets/generated/subrin-favicon-uploaded.dim_32x32.png and is a valid, non-empty PNG image.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows no added files, and there is no evidence that the required PNG asset was created/committed at the specified path.
evidence: frontend/index.html (references /assets/generated/subrin-favicon-uploaded.dim_32x32.png but does not add the file)

hallucinated_features.description: Added an apple-touch-icon link pointing to the same favicon PNG.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest/REQ-15 only asked for rel="icon" (32x32) plus an additional rel="shortcut icon" link; apple-touch-icon was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/introduced metadata summary changes in frontend-file-summaries.txt.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest and unrelated to the favicon fix requirements.
